subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Boo Weekley used five birdies in a row to pull ahead in the Verizon Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C. Weekley shot a six-under-par 65 to reach 15 under and move three shots ahead of Anthony Kim (67).
snippet: The defending champion Boo Weekley used five birdies in a row to pull ahead in the Verizon Heritage in Hilton Head Island, S.C. Weekley shot a six-under-par 65 to reach 15 under and move three shots ahead of Anthony Kim (67).
